message.content:
{
  "daily_summary": "Risk-off close for exchanges/depositories (BSE, CDSL) while PSU rail/infrastructure showed strength (RVNL strong close near day’s high). Towers continue to coil (IndusTower), metals soft (SAIL). Pharma mixed with LUPIN firm, Biocon weak. Our book (-1.16%) held key supports: BSE defended ~2798; CDSL slipped below 1600 but held above 1580; BHEL inside-to-soft day near 276–284 band; GMRAIRPORT still coiling under 105.5 breakout.",
  "top_signals": [
    {"symbol": "RVNL", "signal": "Breakout buy on strength", "reason": "Big volume, strong close near HOD. Clean continuation above 329.9; early momentum >326. Use ~311 as risk for fresh buys.", "price": 324.85},
    {"symbol": "GMRAIRPORT", "signal": "Hold; add only on breakout", "reason": "High-volume base intact; trigger >105.5–106. Risk reference ~99.5. Avoid adding in the range.", "price": 103.76},
    {"symbol": "BHEL", "signal": "Hold; add on breakout", "reason": "Momentum resumes only on decisive push above 287–292. Risk marker ~275–276 on existing.", "price": 277.90},
    {"symbol": "BSE", "signal": "Defend support; add on reclaim", "reason": "Defended 2798 intraday. Add only on reclaim >2860/2879. If 2768 fails, structure weakens.", "price": 2802.20},
    {"symbol": "CDSL", "signal": "Manage risk; add back on reclaim", "reason": "Closed <1600; keep tight risk. Reclaim >1605 for stability; momentum >1665–1670. Consider trimming if <1575.", "price": 1587.60},
    {"symbol": "NBCC", "signal": "Breakout-retest buy", "reason": "Cleared 117.5 intraday (H 118.9) then retested. Buy on strength >118.5–119 or dip 114–115 with stop ~111.5.", "price": 116.47},
    {"symbol": "INDUSTOWER", "signal": "Breakout watch", "reason": "Coiling base; sustained move >415 with volume can start next leg. Risk marker ~392 on fresh buys.", "price": 400.10},
    {"symbol": "LTF", "signal": "Add on breakout; trail", "reason": "Healthy consolidation. Continuation above 301.5–302; trail risk ~291.", "price": 292.55},
    {"symbol": "HUDCO", "signal": "Buy-the-dip setup", "reason": "Strong trend; buy near 226–228 zone with tight stop ~221; add through 235 on strength.", "price": 228.19},
    {"symbol": "IDBI", "signal": "Two-sided plan", "reason": "Accumulate 96–97 with stop ~94.5 or buy strength only above 105 for continuation.", "price": 98.93}
  ],
  "emergency_trades": [
    {"symbol": "BSE", "action": "Sell", "reason": "Break of key support would weaken structure; cut risk.", "quantity": 2, "price": "SL-M 2768.00"},
    {"symbol": "CDSL", "action": "Sell", "reason": "Loss of higher-low stack below recent floor; protect capital.", "quantity": 2, "price": "SL-M 1575.00"},
    {"symbol": "BHEL", "action": "Sell", "reason": "If 274.8 breaks, momentum setup fails near term; reduce exposure.", "quantity": 10, "price": "SL-M 274.80"},
    {"symbol": "GMRAIRPORT", "action": "Sell", "reason": "If it loses 101.9, breakdown risk rises; trim to control drawdown.", "quantity": 20, "price": "SL-M 101.90"}
  ],
  "portfolio": {
    "cash": 3785.45,
    "total_value": 27182.05,
    "holdings_count": 4,
    "holdings": [
      "GMRAIRPORT: 45 units @ 104.05 (CMP 103.76)",
      "BHEL: 20 units @ 281.30 (CMP 277.90)",
      "BSE: 3 units @ 2858.63 (CMP 2802.20)",
      "CDSL: 3 units @ 1610.20 (CMP 1587.60)"
    ]
  },
  "screening_notes": [
    "PSU rail/infrastructure: RVNL strong close near HOD; watch clean breakout >329.9. IRCON steady around 160–162; confirmation >165.",
    "Exchanges/Depositories: BSE tested 2798 support; CDSL slipped <1600 but held >1580. Prefer strength reclaims for adds; MCX still extended—buy only on dips.",
    "Pharma: LUPIN firm; Biocon weak (395 area last week) and needs >405/423 to reassert; Laurus stable above ~970 but add only >1005/1025.",
    "Cap goods/PSU: BHEL range 276–284; trigger >287–292. BEL weak close (403.8); cleaner only >430–432.",
    "Telecom towers: IndusTower coiling; sustained >415 can open fresh leg. Bharti Hexacom steady but lower volume.",
    "Metals: SAIL soft (132); avoid until >145.2. HindCopper range 308–319; prefer strength-only entries with tight stops.",
    "NBFC/Banks: LTF constructive below 301.5; PSU banks (IDBI/UCO/IOB/CENTRALBK) consolidating—favor either reclaim triggers or dip-buys with defined risk.",
    "Renewables: InoxWind choppy; Waaree Ener volatile but holding; NTPC Green range-bound—wait for decisive breakouts.",
    "Discretionary/FMCG: Voltas pulled back to mid-1340s support; Trent firm; Jubilant Food needs >619 to turn momentum.",
    "Execution: If next session gaps >0.7%, let 20–30 minutes set range; favor pullback entries to marked levels with predefined stops. Keep position sizes small given portfolio scale and raise stops on strength."
  ]
}
